name: Mustang Survival Rebel Harmonized Foam Front Zip PFD - Women's
categories: Rebel Harmonized Foam Front Zip PFD
description: A sports bra meets PFD, the Rebel is built on a shorter chassis and a racerback for full range of motion for women paddlers. The fit system incorporates a removable foam pads for all-day support and comfort on the water.420-denier nylon ripstop is lightweight, quick-drying and durable.Adjust-A-Bust fit system with removable underbust memory foam pads mimics support and comfort of a sports bra.Padded neoprene shoulders.Front zipper with 6 points of adjustment fits comfortably and securely.Fleece-lined zippered handwarmer pockets.Meets Harmonized Level 70 buoyancy standard. Approved by Transport Canada and US Coast Guard.
